job.title: .NET Developer (C#, VB.net, ASP.net, SQL)
job.description: The successful candidate will be a C#/VB.net programmer with MS SQL (T-SQL) and ASP.NET experience. The work begins as REMOTE but after safe re-entry is determined feasible, will have to go onsite with a 2-week notice.<br><br><strong>Work Authorization:</strong> US Citizens, Green Card holders, GC-EAD<br><br>ROLE<br><br>Application support and data fixes.
